Posts.Content: Hey Sandra. Just got back from the hospital. The techs found the radiologist and he spoke with me directly after. He said he was 100% sure it was just a shadow. Thanks again for your post. It helped a lot.
Posts.Title: Mammogram callback

Posts.Content:
Hello everyone.
I had a screening mammogram last Tuesday. The doc called me late on Friday and said I needed a spot mammogram and an ultrasound. He said they found something "well defined" and "17 mm" big. When I asked how worried I should be, he said "not very." I immediately called to get an appointment, but they were closed for the weekend. 
I'm worried. Can't help it. I have an appointment for Friday noon (and have called to check for cancellations already). I'm not sleeping well and having trouble eating, but have been doing a lot of research. Does anyone have any suggestions or could shed some light on this?
Posts.Title: Mammogram callback

Posts.Content:
Hi Sandra. Wow, what a great post. Thank you! I hope you are doing well.
In answer to your question, the report came from the radiologist to my ob/gyn, who called me. The form letter I received later was from radiology.
Posts.Title: Mammogram callback
